full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DAM CAN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO'I SGO NAS BZLOG BSGYUR RKYEN NGAN GSOL BYED ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005B (CES 'JAM DPAL GSHIN RJE GSHED KYI BKA' STONG DAM CAN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO'I BZLOG BSGYUR RKYEN NGAN SEL BYED ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, KHA CAG GIS 'JAM DPAL GSHIN RJE GSHED KYI BZLOG BSGYUR ZOR BA DE CHOS RGYAL GYI BZLOG BSGYUR ZHES MING BRTAG NA TSEG MI THUN BA CIG BYAS PA MANG PO YOD PAR BA DANG, CHOS RGYAL GYI BZLOG BSGYUR YIG RNYING MA RNYED PA DANG, SNGA MO NAS DON GNYER CAN 'GA' BSKUL ZHING, SLAR YANG SMAN PA BLO BZANG BKRA SHIS SBYIN BDAG GI RIM GROR DGOS PA CHE ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGOR MA CHAG PAR RANG DANG SKAL MNYAM ZHAN LA 'ANG PHAN PA AE SRID SNYAMS PAS SLOB GNYER MA BYAS PA'I BLUD PON SNYING @006A *, ,KHAMS CAN CHOS RJE BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS MING CAN GYI BLA MA GONG MA RNAMS KYI GSUNG RGYUN BRTEN NAS SUG BRIS SU BGYIS PA'O, ,'DI KYANG RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE'I DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
